name: APOORVA SAHU
college: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

education.school: Guru Tegh Bahadur Institute of Technology

projects.name: Travel Website
projects.description: Developed a dynamic travel website, integrating packages, tours, itineraries, and real-life experiences, driven by my passion for trekking. Through the design and innovative functionality, created an engaging platform that immerses users in travel possibilities.

experiences.description: During my six-week internship at Leasing Monk, a web application for commercial rentals, my role involved developing the following pages: Event Calendar: It enables the users to manage follow-up calls, visits, and reminders efficiently. Also, designed intuitive modal cards for detailed event information and implemented quick filters for seamless event sorting. Recent Activity Notifications: It allows users to track diverse activities such as adding members, sharing proposals, visits, and tasks with Lead Id and Deal Id. Also, implemented an intuitive filter and sort functionality, enhancing user engagement.
